class.name: DVThemeGaugeStyle
class.brief_description: Style resource that controls tick marks, sweep, and colors for gauge-style components.
class.description: DVThemeGaugeStyle supplies gauge-specific defaults for components such as [DV_Gauge]. It determines how the arc is drawn (sweep angle, thickness, rounded caps) and exposes options for tick label formatting. Adjusting these properties through [DVTheme] lets you keep multiple gauges visually consistent without duplicating configuration.

members.member: Width of the gauge arc measured in pixels.
Chooses between flat or rounded arc end caps.
Length (in pixels) of tick marks drawn around the gauge.
When enabled, labels describing configured zones are drawn around the arc.
Toggles display of numeric tick labels.
Number of fractional digits displayed on tick labels.
Padding between the tick labels and the gauge arc.
Controls whether the numeric value is rendered in the center of the gauge.

signal.name: theme_changed
signal.description: Fired after any property is modified so dependent gauges can redraw with the new style.
